verses.verse: Maschil of Ethan the Ezrahite. I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: With my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will I make <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
For I have <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2617>Mercy<s%> shall be built <S%H1129>up<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> wilt thou <S%H3559>establish<s%> in the very <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with my <S%H972>chosen<s%>, I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>:

Thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, And build <S%H1129>up<s%> thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>
And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> also in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the holy <S%H6918>ones<s%>.
For who in the <S%H7834>skies<s%> can be <S%H6186>compared<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? Who among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

A <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7227>very<s%> <S%H6206>terrible<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H3372>ones<s%>, And to be feared above all them that are round about <S%H5439>him<s%>?

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Who is a <S%H2626>mighty<s%> <S%H3050>one<s%>, like unto thee, O Jehovah? And thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is round about <S%H5439>thee<s%>.
Thou <S%H4910>rulest<s%> the <S%H1348>pride<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: When the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H7721>arise<s%>, thou stillest <S%H7623>them<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H1792>broken<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in <S%H1792>pieces<s%>, as one that is <S%H2491>slain<s%>; Thou hast <S%H6340>scattered<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> with the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H776>thine<s%>, the earth also is <S%H8398>thine<s%>: The world and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> <S%H3245>thereof<s%>, thou hast founded them.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> and the <S%H3225>south<s%>, thou hast <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H8396>them<s%>: Tabor and <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Thou hast a <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>; <S%H5810>Strong<s%> is thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H7311>high<s%> is thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>.

Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and <S%H6664>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>: <S%H2617>Lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H6923>go<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> the joyful <S%H8643>sound<s%>: They <S%H1980>walk<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.
In thy <S%H8034>name<s%> do they <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>; And in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> are they <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
For thou art the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of their <S%H5797>strength<s%>; And in thy <S%H7522>favor<s%> our <S%H7161>horn<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
For our <S%H4043>shield<s%> belongeth unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And our <S%H4428>king<s%> to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Then thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> in <S%H2377>vision<s%> to thy <S%H2623>saints<s%>, And <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I have <S%H7737>laid<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%> upon one that is <S%H1368>mighty<s%>; I have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> one <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; With my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> have I anointed <S%H4886>him<s%>:
With whom my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%>; Mine <S%H2220>arm<s%> also shall strengthen <S%H553>him<s%>.
The <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall not <S%H5378>exact<s%> from <S%H1121>him<s%>, Nor the son of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> afflict <S%H6031>him<s%>.
And I will beat <S%H3807>down<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>, And <S%H5062>smite<s%> them that hate <S%H8130>him<s%>.
But my <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall be with <S%H8034>him<s%>; And in my name shall his <S%H7161>horn<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
I will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also on the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> on the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.
He shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H1>me<s%>, Thou art my Father, My <S%H410>God<s%>, and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
I also will <S%H5414>make<s%> him my <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, The <S%H5945>highest<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I <S%H8104>keep<s%> for him for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>; And my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall stand fast with <S%H539>him<s%>.
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> also will I <S%H7760>make<s%> to endure for <S%H5703>ever<s%>, And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
If his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%>, And <S%H3212>walk<s%> not in mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>;
If they <S%H2490>break<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, And <S%H8104>keep<s%> not my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>;
Then will I <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, And their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H5061>stripes<s%>.
But my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I not utterly <S%H6331>take<s%> from <S%H530>him<s%>, Nor suffer my faithfulness to <S%H8266>fail<s%>.
My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I not <S%H2490>break<s%>, Nor <S%H8138>alter<s%> the thing that is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Once <S%H259><s%> have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H6944>holiness<s%>: I will not <S%H3576>lie<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>:
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall endure for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the sun before <S%H8121>me<s%>.
It shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> as the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, And as the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> in the <S%H7834>sky<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But thou hast cast <S%H2186>off<s%> and <S%H3988>rejected<s%>, Thou hast been <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5010>abhorred<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: Thou hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> his <S%H5145>crown<s%> by casting it to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
Thou hast broken <S%H6555>down<s%> all his <S%H1448>hedges<s%>; Thou hast <S%H7760>brought<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> to <S%H4288>ruin<s%>.
All that pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8155>rob<s%> <S%H2781>him<s%>: He is become a reproach to his <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7311>exalted<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>; Thou hast made all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>.
Yea <S%H7725><s%>, thou turnest back the <S%H6697>edge<s%> of his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, And hast not made him to <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
Thou hast made his <S%H2892>brightness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, And <S%H4048>cast<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4048>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
The <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth<s%> hast thou <S%H7114>shortened<s%>: Thou hast <S%H5844>covered<s%> him with <S%H955>shame<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
How <S%H3068>long<s%>, O Jehovah? wilt thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> thyself for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? How long shall thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>?
Oh <S%H2142>remember<s%> how <S%H2465>short<s%> my time <S%H7723>is<s%>: For what vanity hast thou created all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1121>men<s%>!

What <S%H1397>man<s%> is he that shall <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>, That shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>? <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Lord <S%H136><s%>, where are thy <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>, Which thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> in thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>; How I do <S%H5375>bear<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom<s%> the reproach of all the <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%>,
Wherewith thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>reproached<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Wherewith they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
